statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_table;
SELECT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crop_rotation_table;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%';
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, growth_requirements FROM crop_rotation_table ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, growth_requirements FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE crop_name LIKE '%tomato%' ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE crop_name <> 'potato' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE growth_requirements IS NOT NULL AND length(growth_requirements) > 50;
SELECT crop_name, LENGTH(growth_requirements) AS requirements_length FROM crop_rotation_table WHERE requirements_length < 100 ORDER BY requirements_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE requirements LIKE '%sunlight%';
SELECT crop_name, requirements FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(crops.crop_id) FROM categories JOIN crops ON categories.category_id = crops.crop_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crops WHERE crop_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops INNER JOIN categories ON crops.crop_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_name = 'Vegetables';
SELECT crop_name, requirements FROM crops WHERE requirements LIKE '%sunny%' OR requirements LIKE '%well-drained%';
SELECT * FROM categories LEFT JOIN crops ON categories.category_id = crops.crop_id ORDER BY categories.category_name ASC, crops.crop_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crops WHERE requirements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM crop_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT rotation_id, crop_id, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT crop_id, COUNT(rotation_id) AS rotation_count FROM crop_rotation GROUP BY crop_id HAVING rotation_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1
SELECT crop_name, growth_characteristics FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, requirements FROM crops WHERE growth_characteristics LIKE '%fast%'
SELECT c.crop_name, cr.rotation_date FROM crops c INNER JOIN crop_rotation cr ON c.crop_id = cr.crop_id
SELECT category_name, COUNT(crop_id) AS num_crops FROM crop_categories JOIN crops ON crop_categories.category_id = crops.crop_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(crop_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1
SELECT crop_name, growth_period FROM crops WHERE water_requirement = 'High'
SELECT crops.crop_name, growth_characteristics.description FROM crops INNER JOIN growth_characteristics ON crops.crop_id = growth_characteristics.characteristic_id
SELECT * FROM crop_categories WHERE category_name = 'Fruits' ORDER BY category_name ASC
SELECT crop_id, COUNT(requirement_id) AS num_requirements FROM crop_requirements GROUP BY crop_id HAVING num_requirements > 1
SELECT * FROM crops
SELECT crop_name, growth_period FROM crops WHERE water_requirement = 'High'
SELECT c.crop_name, g.characteristic_name FROM crops c JOIN crop_categories cc ON c.crop_id = cc.crop_id JOIN growth_characteristics g ON cc.category_id = g.characteristic_id
SELECT c.crop_name, cr.water_requirement FROM crops c LEFT JOIN crop_requirements cr ON c.crop_id = cr.crop_id
SELECT * FROM growth_characteristics ORDER BY characteristic_name DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_categories;
SELECT crop_name, category_id FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT growth_rate, water_requirement FROM growth_characteristics WHERE growth_rate > 3.0;
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_requirements FROM crops INNER JOIN crop_requirements ON crops.id = crop_requirements.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, previous_crop_id FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_number = 2;
SELECT * FROM crop_categories
SELECT crop_name, category_name FROM crops JOIN crop_categories ON crops.category_id = crop_categories.id
SELECT rotation_number, crop_name, previous_crop_id FROM crop_rotation JOIN crops ON crop_rotation.crop_id = crops.id
SELECT growth_rate, water_requirement FROM growth_characteristics WHERE growth_rate > 0.5
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_requirements, recommended_soil_type FROM crops JOIN crop_requirements ON crops.id = crop_requirements.crop_id
